message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, a fair and simple way to begin.
I'll give you 400k, but I think I deserve more for being the one who will make the next offer
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not willing to give away too much. You can't have it all!
I'll give you a smaller share, but I think I deserve more for being the one who's been rejecting offers so far
I'm not willing to give away too much, but I'm willing to compromise. You can't have all the gains, but I'm willing to give you a decent share.
